metadatas.title: Home
metadatas.description: NextJS SaaS starter kit for rapid development: focus only on the main features, be reassured with a modern frontend, scalable and secure backend. Save effort

Account.title: Account
Account.connectedWith: You are connected with your {varIntlProvider} account
Account.create-password: You haven't created a password because you are automatically connected with a {varIntlProvider} account.
Account.close-account-popover-message: delete your account? This action is irreversible. If you have subscribed to a plan, it will be canceled.

form.password-error: Password must be at least {varIntlMin} characters long.

form.email-error: This is not a valid email address.

form.error-name-min: The name must be at least {varIntlMin} character long

toasters.user-promoted: User promoted. You are no longer the owner of this organization

popover.promote-member: promote this member to owner? There can only be one owner, in which case you will lose all publishing rights for this organization.
popover.revoke-member: revoke this member from the organization

Billing.title: Billing
Billing.subscription-will-be-canceled-at: Your subscription will be permanently canceled on

tooltips.cancel-subscription: Your subscription will be permanently canceled at the end of the billing period on {varIntlDate}. You can continue using your features until this date. Besides, you can always reactivate your subscription in the meantime, without any additional cost.
tooltips.restart-subscription: Your subscription will restart without additional billing.

Billing.no-plan-subscribed-yet: You haven't subscribed to any plan

Purchases.title: Purchases
Purchases.no-purchase-history-description: You haven't purchased any products on our site yet!

toasters.error-delete-contact: Error deleting the contact from the newsletter audience
toasters.error-update-newsletter: An error occurred while updating your newsletter preference. Please try again.
toasters.error-get-contact: An error occurred while retrieving the newsletter contact. Please try again.

Profile.password-not-updated: A problem occurred while updating your password. Please try again.

popover-confirm.message: Are you sure you want to

popover-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete

throws.delete: You cannot delete your account because you are the owner of your organization. Please transfer your rights to another user, otherwise, delete the organization.
throws.cancel: A problem occurred while deleting your account. Please contact us.
throws.cancel-subscription: A problem occurred while canceling the subscription

throws.already-in-an-organization: The user is already a member of an organization.
throws.error-while-creating-invitation: An error occurred. The invitation was not sent. Please try again.
throws.no-organization-found: No organization found. This is likely an error. Please try again.

emailSent.subject: Welcome! Please confirm the validity of your email address.

TeamInvitationPage.invited-with-different-email: You are logged in with a different email address than the one that received the invitation.
TeamInvitationPage.please-logout: Please log in with the corresponding email address and return to this page. If you don't have an account with the invited address, log out and return to this page to create one.
TeamInvitationPage.logged-in-with-right-email: You are logged in with the correct email address, but you need to log out and log back in to accept the invitation.

TeamInvitationPage.invitation-accepted: Invitation accepted, please create an account and log in to finalize the invitation. You will be redirected to the account creation page.
TeamInvitationPage.invitation-accepted-2: Invitation accepted, please log in to your account to finalize it.
TeamInvitationPage.already-accept: You have already accepted the invitation.
TeamInvitationPage.invited: You have been invited to join the team of "{varIntlOrganization}"
TeamInvitationPage.do-you-accept: Do you accept to join this organization?
